How can I list transactions using JSON RPC in Verus?

To list transactions using JSON RPC in Verus, you can use the following command:

```bash
curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "listtransactions", "params": ["*", 20, 100] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
```

This command will retrieve and display transactions 100 to 120 in the system using JSON RPC. You need to replace `myusername` with your actual username.

. Examples: List the most recent 10 transactions in the systems > verus listtransactions List transactions 100 to 120 > verus listtransactions "*" 20 100 As a json rpc call > curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "listtransactions", "params": ["*", 20, 100] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
